Package view

Class view1

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • view.view1
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants
    public class view1
extends processing.core.PApplet
    This class contains all necessary functions of a view to be usable by the controller. first think we initialize all the parameters such as the first x and y position and we define all other parameters that we will use
